CUS-0403.title: User not authenticated
CUS-0403.prod: User authentication is not done. You need to log in again.
CUS-0403.inter: User authentication is not done. You need to log in again.

USE-0002.title: Password too weak.
USE-0002.prod: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, 1 number and 1 symbol.
USE-0002.inter: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, 1 number and 1 symbol.

USE-0006.title: Email already exists
USE-0006.prod: Email already exists. Please verify and try to login
USE-0006.inter: Email already exists. Please verify and try to login

CUS-0405.title: User not authenticated
CUS-0405.prod: The expiration date of user authentication has expired.Please start over again from the beginning.
CUS-0405.inter: The expiration date of user authentication has expired.Please start over again from the beginning.
